name: Germ Scope
description:
Germ Scope is a tiny adventure game!

Prepare yourself for the tiniest adventure at microscopic levels! In this game you are a crazy scientist who wants to evolve a certain species of bacteria into higher forms of microscopic life with a secret ending.

Gameplay rules

In this game you need some finger skills before all of your population dies

Credits*

Germ Scope has been created in 8 hours at the Berlin Mini Game Jam 2017 and is totatly playable but not complete.

@NOXLOF created code and gameplay while I was making the art.
